text: I will start a postdoc with Jat Singh at RC-Trust in Germany.
I will attend the Beyond Regulation workshop at EurIPS.
I will conduct interviews in rural Rwanda on AI Explanability in collaboration with GiveDirectly.
I will present Expading Perspectives on Data Privacy: Insights from Rural Togo at CSCW 2025.
I will present an article on digital social protection and social cohesion at 4S 2025.
Center for Effective Global Action (CEGA) featured my research in a blogpost on interdisciplinary research.
New paper with Microsoft Research colleagues to develop a Responsible AI Maturity Model accepted to CSCW 2025.
I will co-organize a workshop on "Emerging Practices in Participatory AI Design in Public Sector Innovation" at CHI 2025.
I will participate in the 12th Annual Winter School on "Emerging Technologies: Accelerating Impactful Scholarship".
I received a $20k grant from the Center for Effective Global Action, in partnership with GiveDirectly.
New paper with Nitin Kohli on expertise accepted to social impact evaluations for genAI workshop at NeurIPS (2024).
I will participate in a workshop on Practicing Inclusivity in AI at CSCW (2024) in San Jos√© Costa Rica.
New paper on perspectives on privacy and mobile phone data in rural Togo accepted at CSCW (2025).
I will participate in a workshop at the Digital Technology and Sustainable Development Workshop at Oxford University.
I will participate in a public workshop at the White House on Participatory Algorithmic Design.
I will give a talk at Microsoft on expanding perspectives on data privacy based on fieldwork in Togo.
I will start a summer internship with Microsoft's Office AI team working on Copilot.
I will give a talk at the UC Berkeley on expanding perspectives on data privacy based on fieldwork in Togo.
I will co-teach Big Data & Development in Spring 2024.
